00035         /**
00036          * Digital State type
00037          *
00038          * \note NOTE: Packing efficiency is not important.
00039          *
00040          */
00041         typedef unsigned char phidget_digital_state;
00042 
00043         /**
00044          * Digital States definition
00045          *
00046          */
00047         typedef enum _digital_states {
00048 
00049                 // output
00050                 DIGITAL_STATE_O_T = 1,  // tri-state
00051                 DIGITAL_STATE_O_X,              // don't care
00052                 DIGITAL_STATE_O_I,              // invert
00053                 DIGITAL_STATE_O_0,
00054                 DIGITAL_STATE_O_1,
00055 
00056                 // input
00057                 DIGITAL_STATE_I_Q,              // hi-q
00058                 DIGITAL_STATE_I_X,              // don't care
00059                 DIGITAL_STATE_I_I,              // invert
00060                 DIGITAL_STATE_I_0,
00061                 DIGITAL_STATE_I_1,
00062 
00063         } digital_states;

00119          * Message types
00120          *
00121          * 0 is reserved

00135         /**
00136          * Message envelope definition
00137          *
00138          *
00139          * @param type message type
00140          * @param serial phidget device serial id
00141          * @param message_body message body for the specific message type
00142          *
00143          */
00144         typedef struct {
00145 
00146                 bus_message_type type;
00147 
00148                 union _message_body {
00149 
00150                         message_shutdown                                        ms;
00151                         message_timer                                           mt;
00152                         message_phidget_device                          mpd;
00153                         message_phidget_digital_states      mps;
00154                         message_phidget_digital_set_states  mpss;
00155 
00156                 } message_body;
00157 
00158         } bus_message;
